mapper.select: SELECT HSPT_ID , LRGC_CD , MDDL_CD , SMLL_CD , SMLL_KR_NM , SMLL_ENGL_NM , SMLL_ABBR_NM , OTPT_SQNC , APPL_DATE , EXPR_DATE , CHRC1 , CHRC2 , CHRC3 , CHRC4 , CHRC5 , nmbr1 , nmbr2 , nmbr3 , nmbr4 , nmbr5 , RGST_ID , RGST_DTTM , MDFC_ID , MDFC_DTTM FROM RIS0103 WHERE HSPT_ID = #{hsptId} AND LRGC_CD = #{lrgcCd} AND MDDL_CD = #{mddlCd} ORDER BY OTPT_SQNC, LRGC_CD, MDDL_CD
